metadata.description: Prospectus for Cordier's "Nouvelles lois de la République française", a work that was never published?

"Cet ouvrage se trouvera chez Onfroy, libraire, rue St. Victor, n°. 11, à Paris, chez lequel on souscrit dès-à-présent, moyennant la somme de 5 liv. ... On souscrit aussi à Strasbourg chez Treuttel, lib."--P. 7
Prospectus for Cordier's "Histoire du procès de Louis XVI", published in 1793, on last page
"Livres qui se trouvent chez le même libraire": p. 7
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover.
